overview: Qi Ge reunited unexpectedly with college lover Luo Entai. Encounter the love that once suddenly evaporated in the world, the most urgent thing besides Luo Entai's ecstasy is to wonder why Qi Ge suddenly disappeared. I never thought that Qi Ge at this time was already someone else's lover, and even said nothing about the cause of the sudden disappearance. Luo Entai was not willing to let go like this, so under a secret follow-up, he discovered the shocking secrets of Qi Ge and his lover Pang Tianshan ...
title: Eye in Dark
